item.title: Aspose.Slides for PHP via Java 23.12 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Slides for PHP via Java Key Summary Category SLIDESPHP-41 Use Aspose.Slides for Java 23.12 features Enhancement Public API Changes Handout Presentation export layout mode added A new Handout presentation export layout mode was added. It represents the corresponding PowerPoint “Print as Handouts” feature. An enumeration HandoutType represents the possible handout types: One slide per page Two slides per page Three slides per page Four slides per page in a horizontal sequence Four slides per page in a vertical sequence Six slides per page in a horizontal sequence Six slides per page in a vertical sequence Nine slides per page in a horizontal sequence Nine slides per page in a vertical sequence Below is an example of rendering of a presentation in the Handout layout:

item.title: Aspose.Slides for PHP via Java 23.11 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Slides for PHP via Java Key Summary Category SLIDESPHP-39 Use Aspose.Slides for Java 23.11 features Enhancement

item.title: Aspose.Slides for PHP via Java 23.10 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Slides for PHP via Java Key Summary Category SLIDESPHP-37 Use Aspose.Slides for Java 23.10 features Enhancement Public API Changes TiffOptions.BwConversionMode property and BlackWhiteConversionMode enum added The new TiffOptions.BwConversionMode property allows you to specify the algorithm for converting a color image to a black and white image. This setting is applied only when CompressionType is set to TiffCompressionTypes.

item.title: Aspose.Slides for PHP via Java 23.9 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Slides for PHP via Java Key Summary Category SLIDESPHP-35 Use Aspose.Slides for Java 23.9 features Enhancement Public API Changes Text Animation Effect - AnimateTextType enum has been added The new AnimateTextType enum has been added and it represents the animate text type of an animation effect. It allows to set the following text animation types:

item.title: Aspose.Slides for PHP via Java 23.8 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Slides for PHP via Java Key Summary Category SLIDESPHP-33 Use Aspose.Slides for Java 23.8 features Enhancement Public API Changes ShowMediaControls property has been added for SlideShowSettings The ShowMediaControls property was added for the SlideShowSettings class, which Represents the slide show settings for the presentation. Example: $pres = new Presentation(); $pres->getSlideShowSettings()->setShowMediaControls(true);

item.title: Aspose.Slides for PHP via Java 23.7 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Slides for PHP via Java Key Summary Category SLIDESPHP-31 Use Aspose.Slides for Java 23.7 features Enhancement Public API Changes Markdown export The presentation can now be exported in a new format: Markdown. The default export looks like this: New member of the SaveFormat enum has been added: SaveFormat.Md. $pres = new Presentation("pres.pptx"); $pres->save("pres.

item.title: Aspose.Slides for PHP via Java 23.6 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Slides for PHP via Java Key Summary Category SLIDESPHP-29 Use Aspose.Slides for Java 23.6 features Enhancement Public API Changes ILoadOptions.setDefaultTextLanguage and ILoadOptions.getDefaultTextLanguage methods have been added New setDefaultTextLanguage() and getDefaultTextLanguage() methods have been added to ILoadOptions interface and LoadOptions class. It represents the default language for presentation text. The example below demonstrates using load options to define the default text culture:

item.title: Aspose.Slides for PHP via Java 23.5 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Slides for PHP via Java Key Summary Category SLIDESPHP-27 Use Aspose.Slides for Java 23.5 features Enhancement Public API Changes AfterAnimationType enum, Effect.AfterAnimationType, and Effect.AfterAnimationColor have been added AfterAnimationType, a new enum, has been added. It represents the after animation type of an animation effect and can be used with Effect.AfterAnimationType and Effect.AfterAnimationColor:

item.title: Aspose.Slides for PHP via Java 23.4 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Slides for PHP via Java Key Summary Category SLIDESPHP-25 Use Aspose.Slides for Java 23.4 features Enhancement

item.title: Aspose.Slides for PHP via Java 23.3 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Slides for PHP via Java Key Summary Category SLIDESPHP-23 Use Aspose.Slides for Java 23.3 features Enhancement SLIDESPHP-68 Aspose.Slides for PHP via Java - PHP 8.1 support Investigation Public API Changes Animation timing settings: Rewind when done playing - ITiming.Rewind has been added The ITiming.Rewind attribute has been added to specify whether an effect will rewind after playing.

item.title: Aspose.Slides for PHP via Java 23.2 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Slides for PHP via Java Key Summary Category SLIDESPHP-21 Use Aspose.Slides for Java 23.2 features Enhancement Public API Changes Find and replace text fragments with changes in formatting Added support for finding and replacing text fragments with changes in formatting. A new method in the public API has been added for this purpose: SlideUtil.

item.title: Aspose.Slides for PHP via Java 23.1 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Slides for PHP via Java Key Summary Category SLIDESPHP-19 Use Aspose.Slides for Java 23.1 features Enhancement SLIDESPHP-66 Converting autoshapes to images (JPG or PNG) Investigation
